content.name: exp
content.prop: exp x = infsum (from 0) (λn. x ^ n / of_nat (fact n))

content.name: cos
prop: (λn. if even n then -1 ^ (n DIV 2) * x ^ n / of_nat (fact n) else 0)

content.name: sin
prop: (λn. if even n then 0 else -1 ^ ((n - 1) DIV 2) * x ^ n / of_nat (fact n))

content.name: log
content.prop: log y = (THE x. exp x = y)

content.name: pi
content.prop: pi = (THE p. 0 < p ∧ sin p = 0 ∧ (∀x. 0 < x ∧ x < p ⟶ ¬(sin x = 0)))

content.name: tan
content.prop: tan x = sin x / cos x

content.name: atn
content.prop: atn y = (THE x. -pi / 2 < x ∧ x < pi / 2 ∧ tan x = y)

content.name: asn
content.prop: asn y = (THE x. -pi / 2 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ pi / 2 ∧ sin x = y)

content.name: cos_asn
content.prop: -1 ≤ x ⟶ x ≤ 1 ⟶ cos (asn x) = sqrt (1 - x ^ (2::nat))

content.name: acs
content.prop: acs y = (THE x. 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ pi ∧ cos x = y)

content.name: sin_acs
content.prop: -1 ≤ x ⟶ x ≤ 1 ⟶ sin (acs x) = sqrt (1 - x ^ (2::nat))

content.name: power
prop: if ∃m. ∃n. odd m ∧ odd n ∧ abs y = of_nat m / of_nat n then

content.name: root
content.prop: root n x = real_sgn x * exp (log (abs x) / of_nat n)
